name: GLKEffectPropertyLight
desc: Lighting information for use in GLKit rendering effects.

items.name: var enabled: GLboolean
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether calculations should be performed on this light.

items.name: var position: GLKVector4
items.desc: The position of the light in world coordinates.

items.name: var transform: GLKEffectPropertyTransform
items.desc: A transform applied to the lightâ€™s position and direction before calculating the contribution of the light.

items.name: var ambientColor: GLKVector4
items.desc: The ambient portion of the light.

items.name: var diffuseColor: GLKVector4
items.desc: The diffuse portion of the light.

items.name: var specularColor: GLKVector4
items.desc: The specular portion of the light.

items.name: var constantAttenuation: GLfloat
items.desc: A constant factor applied to the attenuation of a point light or spotlight.

items.name: var linearAttenuation: GLfloat
items.desc: A linear factor applied to the attenuation of a point light or spotlight.

items.name: var quadraticAttenuation: GLfloat
items.desc: A quadratic factor applied to the attenuation of a point light or spotlight.

items.name: var spotCutoff: GLfloat
items.desc: The angle in degrees where the spotlight is cut off.

items.name: var spotDirection: GLKVector3
items.desc: A vector indicating the direction the spotlight is projecting.

items.name: var spotExponent: GLfloat
items.desc: A value indicating how focused the spotlight is.

items.name: enum GLKLightingType
items.desc: A constant that describes how lighting is calculated by an effect.
